channel.title: Festive Tech Calendar on Erlend Rushfeldt - Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Festive Tech Calendar on Erlend Rushfeldt - Blog

item.title: SantaÂ´s Magic Cost Management Automation
item.description: This blogpost is posted in correlation with the Festive Tech Calendar. Festive Tech Calendar is a community event that goes on through the whole of December. The event is raising donations for the Raspberry PI Foundation. The Raspberry PI Foundation is a charity that help children learn to code. Please checkout the Just Giving page and the Festive Tech Calendar. Santa’s workshop has changed immensely the last 10 years. With kids wanting iPhones, PlayStations or the newest Fortnite battle pass.

item.title: Help Santa Secure His Naughty List
item.description: Even on the North Pole they must adopt new technologies, and Santa has started using Bicep to deploy his list of this year’s presents. Last year, Santa got a huge fine from the North pole Data Protection Authority after he committed the full naughty list into source control in a public repository. This year, Santa needs help with securing his secrets in Bicep templates during deployments! Before I start the blogpost, I want to give a shoutout to the organizers of the Festive Tech Calendar for the amazing work they do!
